name: Arcane Rush (LelouchV0)
description:
How to Play

Press "Space" for jump and Left Mouse click or "F" to attack. You can pause the game with "ESC"

You can slash two types of obstacles the first is bat and other is Wizard's Fireball.

I wanted to make an interpretation of the google dino run game by myself.

The first time you open the game, it may run slowly and hang because of html5.

Assets I use in this Project:

https://xdeviruchi.itch.io/8-bit-fantasy-adventure-music-pack

https://pimen.itch.io/fire-spell-effect-02

https://ansimuz.itch.io/gothicvania-patreon-collection

https://ansimuz.itch.io/flappy-chicken

https://darkpixel-kronovi.itch.io/rogue-knight

Also icon generated by midjourney AI
